course.title: Suomi-English (DIFFICULT)
course.description: KTouch training file generated Sun Mar 11 09:59:58 2007 Perl Script written by Steinar Theigmann and Håvard Frøiland. Re-written for Kortepohja elementary school in Jyväskylä, Finland, in October 2013 by Terho Reuhkala.
